page.description: If the List definition specified that server-side summary values should be computed for any of the fields in the list, retrieves the summary value.

argument.name: UXListName
argument.description: The ID of the List control.

argument.name: field
argument.description: The field to fetch the summary.

argument.name: summaryType
argument.description: The type of summary to get. Can be one of the following values:

page.example: //get the 'total' for the 'QTY' column in 'list1' var valueTot = {dialog.object}.getListServerSideSummaryValue('list1','QTY','total');
page.note: The summary value will only be available if you specifically requested it in the List builder.

*[IMPORTANT]* The server-side summary value is the summary for *[all]* data in the current List query - not just the records that are currently shown in the List control. In the case of paginated Lists the List query may have many more records than are shown in the List.
page.limitations: List Control Based on SQL Data Only
